Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 35th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1968...
Injured on 7/11/1970 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/23/1971 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/28/1973 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/11/1975, off Don Newhauser (PIT)...
Injured on 7/24/1976 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/21/1987 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
